data.title: Education Standing Committee
data.meta_description: The committee educates Congress and federal agencies about state concerns and serves as a forum for state legislators and legislative staff to learn about and share information regarding programs and initiatives in other states.
data.text: The Education Standing Committee educates Congress and federal agencies about state concerns and serves as a forum for state legislators and legislative staff to learn about and share information regarding programs and initiatives in other states. The Education Committee has jurisdiction over P-20 education issues, including early childhood education, K-12 education and teachers, special education and higher education.
